treatment-md.title: Pagurus rectidactylus Komai, Saito & Myorin, 2015, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: A new species of the hermit crab genus Pagurus Fabricius, 1775 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae) from shallow coastal waters in Japan, with a checklist of the East Asian species of the genus
